sentences.en: " Mary, Burgess is not a bad man. "
sentences.cn: " 玛丽, 伯杰斯不是个坏人 呀.
" 这话说得再多,也帮不了 伯杰斯 的忙!

sentences.en: " Well , Burgess deserves it -- he will never get another congregation here.
sentences.cn: " 可伯杰斯遭人恨是活该呀 -- 在这块地方,他再也别想有人听他布道了.

sentences.en: And by chance they caught a glimpse of Mr. Burgess as he turned a corner.
sentences.cn: 碰巧他们又瞥见了在街角处的伯杰斯先生.

sentences.en: Burgess put his hand into his pocket.
sentences.cn: 伯杰斯又把手伸到衣袋里.

sentences.en: Burgess was taxed with this and stoutly denied it.
sentences.cn: 伯杰斯为此受到了责难,但是他自己坚决否认有这回事.

sentences.en: Burgess: Because he decides who wins or loses. Not my opponent.
sentences.cn: 队员们: 因为是他决定谁赢谁输, 而不是我们的对手.

sentences.en: Flaherty dithered in a little palsy of indignation ( Anthony Burgess )
sentences.cn: 弗莱厄蒂在愤怒的痉挛中发抖 ( 安东尼伯吉斯 )

sentences.en: I reckon he was the best - hated man among us, except the Reverend Burgess. "
sentences.cn: 叫我说, 除了 伯杰斯 牧师,在咱们这些人当中,最遭人恨的就是他了.

sentences.en: It was Burgess's turn to be paralysed.
sentences.cn: 这下轮到伯杰斯发呆了.

sentences.en: Maly understood the idealism of people like Philby and Burgess, and their desire for political action.
sentences.cn: 马利深知菲尔比和伯吉斯之流的理想主义和他们采取政治行动的意愿.

sentences.en: The Burgess and Maclean affair reinforced Hoover's prejudices.
sentences.cn: 伯吉斯和麦克莱恩事件更加深了胡佛的偏见.

sentences.en: Two years later, Burgess and Maclean defected.
sentences.cn: 两年以后, 伯吉斯和麦克莱恩叛逃了.

sentences.en: We rarely remember the entirety of the plot ( Anthony Burgess )
sentences.cn: 我们很少能记清全部情节 ( 安东尼伯吉斯 )

sentences.en: You know the thing that was charged against Burgess years ago.
sentences.cn: 你们都知道好多年以前大家怪罪伯杰斯的那件事.
